title: homepage_loads_successfully
description: Verify that the homepage loads successfully and displays the introduction to the freelancer.

title: navigation_menu_functionality
description: Test that the navigation menu is visible on the homepage and allows navigation to different sections of the portfolio.

title: services_displayed_with_details
description: Ensure all freelancing services are displayed on the services page with their descriptions and icons.

title: projects_listed_and_details_shown
description: Verify that the projects page lists all completed projects and clicking on a project shows its detailed information.

title: about_section_information_display
description: Check that the about page displays information about the freelancer including skills and experience clearly.

title: contact_form_submission_and_notification
description: Test that the contact form collects visitor information, sends an email notification upon submission, and shows a success message.
